name: Breaching humpback pair
info: Elding whale diary: classic tour saw two humpback whales breaching and tail-slapping near the islands outside Reykjavík.

name: Island humpback pair
info: Elding whale diary: pair of humpbacks lingering by the islands just outside Reykjavík harbour.

name: Rolling humpback near islands
info: Elding whale diary: third humpback whale rolling and slapping its pectoral fins near the same island group later in the tour.

name: Shallow-feeding humpbacks
info: Elding whale diary: two humpback whales moving side by side in shallow water with harbour porpoises nearby.

name: Lundey humpback pair
info: Elding whale diary: two familiar humpbacks travelling together near Lundey island in calm winter sun.

name: Deep-diving humpback
info: Elding whale diary: a third humpback whale in the area doing long dives away from the original pair.

name: Humpback Banana
info: Elding whale diary: known humpback Banana seen surfacing with a companion, with white-beaked dolphins bow-riding nearby.

name: Banana's companion
info: Elding whale diary: Banana's travelling companion staying close alongside, occasionally fluking in golden-hour light.

name: Sunset humpback pair
info: Elding whale diary: two humpbacks, including Banana, repeatedly showing tails near a buoy before sunset.

name: Resident humpback duo
info: Elding whale diary: two resident humpback whales travelling close to land in strong winter winds just outside Reykjavík.

name: Race Rocks humpbacks AM
info: Eagle Wing Tours daily sightings: morning tour with several humpback whales feeding in strong currents off Race Rocks, with sea lions nearby.
area: Race Rocks, Juan de Fuca Strait, BC, Canada

name: Race Rocks humpbacks PM
info: Eagle Wing Tours daily sightings: afternoon tour encountered multiple humpback whales circling bait balls near Race Rocks lighthouse.
area: Race Rocks, Juan de Fuca Strait, BC, Canada

name: Long Beach humpbacks 12pm
info: Harbor Breeze whale sightings report: midday Long Beach cruise recorded around sixteen humpback whales with thousands of common dolphins.

name: Long Beach humpbacks 3pm
info: Harbor Breeze whale sightings report: afternoon Long Beach trip saw two humpback whales mixed in with large pods of dolphins.

name: December 3 humpback group
info: Harbor Breeze whale sightings report: Long Beach tours documented about five humpback whales among hundreds of common dolphins.

name: Long Beach humpbacks 12pm
info: Harbor Breeze whale sightings report: noon cruise with eight humpback whales working bait balls near the 150–300 ft line.

name: Long Beach humpbacks 3pm
info: Harbor Breeze whale sightings report: afternoon Long Beach trip recorded eleven humpback whales spread out along the edge of the shipping lane.

name: Edmonds humpback pair
info: Orca Network recent sightings: ferry SPOKANE slowed for two humpback whales just off the Edmonds ferry terminal in Puget Sound.
area: Off Edmonds, Puget Sound, Washington, USA

name: Port Susan Bigg's orcas
info: Orca Network recent sightings: Bigg's killer whales moving slowly southbound through Port Susan between Hat Island and Camano.

name: Hood Canal orca group
info: Orca Network recent sightings: at least four orcas observed north of Bangor on the west side of Hood Canal, milling and splashing in one area.

name: Kaikōura canyon humpback
info: Typical early-summer humpback sighting along the edge of the deep Kaikōura Canyon, a known hotspot for whales just off the South Island coast.
area: Kaikōura Canyon, South Island, New Zealand

name: Offshore Kaikōura humpback
info: Humpback whale moving slowly along the submarine canyon where multiple species are regularly encountered on local tours.
area: Off Kaikōura, South Island, New Zealand

name: Kaikōura cow–calf humpbacks
info: Cow–calf pair observed near the head of Kaikōura Canyon, within the area highlighted as prime whale habitat.
area: Kaikōura Coast, South Island, New Zealand

name: Small humpback group off Kaikōura
info: Group of humpbacks spread out over the canyon rim, a typical pattern for feeding whales in this region.
area: Kaikōura Canyon, South Island, New Zealand

name: Breaching humpback near Kaikōura
info: Single humpback breaching on the seaward side of the canyon, consistent with frequent photographic reports from the area.
area: Off Kaikōura, South Island, New Zealand

name: Evening humpback in Kaikōura Canyon
info: Evening sighting of a humpback surfacing repeatedly near the main canyon upwelling zone.
area: Kaikōura Canyon, South Island, New Zealand

name: Hauraki Gulf humpback
info: Humpback whale encountered along a typical eco-safari route inside the Hauraki Gulf Marine Park.
area: Hauraki Gulf Marine Park, New Zealand

name: Central Hauraki humpback
info: Typical seasonal humpback sighting in the deeper central gulf, where multiple whale species are recorded each year.
area: Hauraki Gulf Marine Park, New Zealand

name: Outer Hauraki humpback
info: Humpback surfaced repeatedly near the shelf-break edge towards the outer Hauraki Gulf.

name: Humpback near gulf islands
info: Single humpback sighted between gulf islands on a standard 4.5-hour eco cruise.

name: Hauraki Gulf humpback at shelf
info: Humpback observed near the marine park’s outer shelf where multiple species converge.

name: Albany humpback offshore
info: Early-summer humpback travelling through King George Sound, one of WA’s key whale-viewing areas.
area: King George Sound, Albany, Western Australia

name: Humpback near Middleton Beach
info: Humpback sighted near the entrance to King George Sound, close to well-known shore-based lookout points.
area: Off Middleton Beach, Albany, Western Australia

name: King George Sound humpback
info: Humpback moving slowly across King George Sound, part of the south coast migration corridor.
area: King George Sound, Albany, Western Australia

name: Albany humpback at sound entrance
info: Single humpback whale sighted near the entrance of the sound, heading south towards offshore waters.

name: Margaret River humpback
info: Humpback whale moving along the southwest WA coastline near popular lookout spots.

name: Esperance humpback near islands
info: Humpback spotted near offshore islands along the south coast migration route.

name: South coast humpback
info: Humpback whale observed further offshore along the WA south coast corridor.

name: Byron Bay offshore humpback
info: Late-season humpback whale moving along the humpback highway off Cape Byron.
area: Off Byron Bay, New South Wales, Australia

name: Humpback near Cape Byron
info: Single humpback sighted offshore near the cape’s whale-watching lookouts.
area: Off Byron Bay, New South Wales, Australia

name: Eden humpback in Twofold Bay
info: Humpback whale recorded inside Twofold Bay, a well-known whale-watching location on the NSW south coast.
area: Twofold Bay, Eden, New South Wales, Australia

name: Offshore humpback off Eden
info: Humpback whale further offshore from Eden on the continuation of the migration route.
area: Off Eden, New South Wales, Australia

name: Contender off Charleston
info: OCEARCH-tagged great white shark Contender (approx. 14 ft, 1,650 lbs) pinged about 105 miles off the coast of Charleston, South Carolina, following his southbound fall migration.
area: Atlantic Ocean, ~105 miles off Charleston, South Carolina, USA

name: Bella off Virginia coast
info: Bella, a 700-pound, 10-foot great white shark tagged by OCEARCH, pinged off the eastern shore of Virginia between Fisherman Island National Wildlife Refuge and Virginia Beach during her first tracked southbound migration.
area: Atlantic Ocean off Virginia Beach, USA

name: Hilton Head first great white of season
info: Charter captain Chip Michalove and Outcast Sport Fishing reported the first great white shark of the season off Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, on November 30, 2025.
area: Atlantic Ocean off Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, USA

name: Saco Bay great white
info: A great white shark was captured on video and reported as repeatedly spotted in Saco Bay near Ocean Park and Goosefare Brook, Maine, on the morning of November 30, 2025.
area: Saco Bay, off the coast of Maine, USA
